author: NBCNews.com
title: New York primary mess highlights concern over mail-in ballots, November election
description: NBC News’ Cynthia McFadden reports on what New York’s uncalled primary race means for November when 50 to 80 million Americans are expected to vote by mail.

author: NBCNews.com
title: Trump: Generals think Beirut explosion 'was a bomb of some kind'
description: President Trump claimed that U.S. generals believe the massive Beirut, Lebanon, explosion was "not some kind of manufacturing explosion," adding that "they seem to think it was an attack. It was a bomb of some kind."
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Growing concern over schools reopening amid rising coronavirus cases
description: In Georgia’s largest school district, 260 employees have already tested positive or been asked to quarantine after being exposed to the virus with in-person learning set to be phased in later this month.
source.name: NBC News

author: NBCNews.com
title: Colorado police apologize for detaining Black family in stolen car mistake
description: Police say they were responding to reports of a stolen vehicle, but soon discovered it was not the family’s blue SUV that was reported missing. Instead, it was a motorcycle with the same license plate number from a different state.
source.name: NBC News

title: U.S. hospitals see growing wave of coronavirus patients
description: Across the nation, hospitals are being pushed to the brink as COVID-19 cases rise while many continue to ignore social distancing measures and mask mandates.

title: U.S. launches two clinical trials for coronavirus antibody treatment
description: The NIH and U.S. drug maker Eli Lilly are looking for 2,000 volunteers for antibody drug trials to treat patients suffering through the ravages of COVID-19.

title: Trump on rising coronavirus death toll: ‘It is what it is’

title: Massive explosion in Lebanon kills dozens, injures thousands

title: Expert: U.S. has 2 weeks to get mail voting right to avoid Election Day mess
